summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue North from Helen Street to the north line of Interlaken, et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks under Ordinance No. 18691, creating Local Improvement District No. 1792 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
